Limpopo WMA, bụ ihe e jiri mara ya ma ọ bụ mpaghara nchekwa mmiri Limpopo; ma ọ bụ ihe e jere mara ya na bekee bụ ;Limpopo Water Management Area (coded: 1), na Ndịda Afrịka  gụnyere nnukwu osimiri ndị a: Osimiri Limpopo, Osimiri Matlabas, Osimiri Mokolo, Osimiri Lephalala, Osimiri Mogalakwena, Osimiri Sand na Osimiri Nzhelele ma kpuchie ihe mgbochi mmiri ndị a.
Mpaghara igbapu mmiri bụ ndịa; A41, A42, A50, A61 ruo A63, A71, A72 na A80.
